structure.unit: ARTICLE II. BULK SALES OF PLANTS, AVOCADOS, LIMES AND MANGOES

text.section:
Sec. 8A-51. Definitions.
As used in this article:
Bulk means six (6) or more plants, or quantities of fruit in excess of one (1) bushel by weight or fifty-five (55) pounds.
Fruit means avocados, limes, and mangoes.
Grower means any person who grows said plants or fruit for sale in bulk.
Plants means trees, shrubs, vines, foliage, buds, bulbs, seeds, and all other plants and plant parts.
